title: Game crash
body: i just got a windows update today and now my league client crashes after champ select. i already followed a bunch of steps to fixing it but nothing has worked, i turned off the Xbox video thing, I've scanned all my files for corrupt files and i checked my graphics card drivers for updates and everythings fully updated i don't know whats wrong and id like to play before the season ends.

replies.body:
Some recent Windows 10 updates have caused some players to be running League or Windows at resolutions outside what their PC can display. I recommend working through the following steps to resolve this.

First, I suggest going into your [resolution settings](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html) and ensuring the resolution you're running is set to what Windows recommends. After you've done that, we'll want to ensure your League settings are refreshed to grab the right resolution. 

First, log into League, then navigate to your installation directory for League, which should be in this directory:

>C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named *Config*, then hop into a custom match to confirm the changes went through. Let me know if this helped.
